mapper.select: SELECT INCUM_NO, CMP_ID, JOB_NAME, INCUM_TITLE, INCUM_CONTENT, INCUM_NAME, TO_CHAR(INCUM_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') INCUM_DATE, INCUM_HITS, DEPARTMENT, SUBTITLE, INCUM_DEL_DATE FROM INCUM_INTERVIEW WHERE INCUM_NO = #{incumNo} AND INCUM_DEL_DATE IS NULL

WITH ORDEREDINTERVIEW AS( SELECT INCUM_NO, CMP_ID, JOB_NAME, INCUM_TITLE, INCUM_CONTENT, INCUM_NAME, TO_CHAR(INCUM_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') INCUM_DATE, INCUM_HITS, DEPARTMENT, SUBTITLE FROM INCUM_INTERVIEW WHERE INCUM_DEL_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY INCUM_NO DESC ) SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ORDEREDINTERVIEW.* FROM ORDEREDINTERVIEW ) A
RNUM BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
